item.title: setOsPasswordFromEncrypted
item.description: SoftLayer_Resource_Configuration::setOsPasswordFromEncrypted Overview The setOsPasswordFromEncrypted method is used to set the operating system password from a key/pair encrypted password signed by SoftLayer. Parameters Name Type Description encryptedPassword string Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values boolean
